columns.text: Amber Light Villas offers the combination of comfortable villas opening to private terraces and balconies with stunning views to the Aegean Sea along with the hotel comforts, services and facilities.

items.title: Pool Suites
items.description: The suites with a swimming pool of Amber Light are beautifully appointed to offer relaxation and unique moments in Santorini.
items.excerpt: The suites with a swimming pool of Amber Light are beautifully appointed to offer relaxation and unique moments in Santorini.
items.seo_title: Pool Suites | Rooms | Amber Light Villas
items.seo_description: The Pool Suites have a spacious living room, a separate bedroom, private patio, private swimming pool. Stunning sea views. Book this suite today!

items.title: Jacuzzi Suites
items.description: Comfortable and welcoming paradises in Imerovigli, the suites with private patio and outdoor jacuzzi can accommodate 2 people in their spacious premises.
items.excerpt: Comfortable and welcoming paradises in Imerovigli, the suites with private patio and outdoor jacuzzi can accommodate 2 people in their spacious premises.
items.seo_title: Jacuzzi Suites | Rooms | Amber Light Villas
items.seo_description: The Jacuzzi Suites are tastefully-decorated spacious interiors with a private patio, outdoor jacuzzi and swimming pool. Exquisite sea views. Book this villa now!

items.title: The Amber Light Villa
items.description: The Amber Light Villa are our absolute gem!
items.excerpt: The Amber Light Villa are our absolute gem!
items.seo_title: The Amber Light Villa | Rooms | Amber Light Villas
items.seo_description: The Amber Light Villa has an elegantly-decorated living room, a round bed, private patio leading to the pool, hot tub and steam room. Book this villa today!

items.title: Two Bedroom Villas With Jacuzzi
items.description: The villa with 2 bedrooms is the ideal choice for families and friends who wish to share a sophisticated villa for their holidays in Santorini.
items.excerpt: The villa with 2 bedrooms is the ideal choice for families and friends who wish to share a sophisticated villa for their holidays in Santorini.
items.seo_title: Two Bedroom Villas With Jacuzzi | Rooms | Amber Light Villas
items.seo_description: Two Bedroom Villas With Jacuzzi are an ideal choice for families & friends. Spacious living room, private patio with jacuzzi. Outdoor pool & bar. Book now!

SEO.title: Rooms | Amber Light Villas | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Check out the luxury rooms of Aqua Vista Hotel's Amber Light Villas located in the charming village of Imerovigli.
